skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Reinforce
skill.description: For an agent to move toward an agent, and reinforce it. Once the system is reached, the agent starts reinforcing it.

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to "reach" the entity.

link.name: operate
link.description: To enact the decision to reinforce the entity once it is reached.

feedback.name: reinforcing
feedback.description: Sent once the agent is reinforcing the entity.
